cab.content: fCONFIDENTIAL ^ ,^cnJP489$DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC majesty's government(68) SO COPY NO. 6 514th June, I960CABINETSPECIAL, DRAWING RIGHTS IN THE INTERNATIONAL.I/IONETARY FUND: DRAFT WHITE paper note by the Secretary of the CabinetThe ne::t meeting of the Cabinet has been arranged for thursday, 20th June, 1968 at 10.00 a. rn. The Cabinet aretherefore invited to approve without discussion the memorandumby the Chancellor of the Exchequer on Special Drawing Rights inthe International Monetary Fund (C(68) 70) so that the White Papermay be published, as proposed, on Wednesday, 19th June, If nocomment is received by the Chancellor of the Exchequers PrivateOffice by 6.00 p. rn. on Monday, 17th June, approval will be assumed.(Signed) BURKE trend cabinet Office, S.W. 1.14th June, 1968
